divs: sighting detailswe went out to have a cigarette in front of the house. my friends girlfriend saw them so we started filming on his phone. before we got the chance to get the phone there were several different objects that had disappeared. we had no idea what it could be. the objects were scattered and moving in very random motions, during the video we filmed four of the lights line up in a straight line. another object comes from the very bottom right of the video and starts to float up towards the others. we were freaking out (sorry for the language). i was very shocked and still am about it. i dont have the file on my phone (which im using to do this). please look at it on youtube.com. we want to find out what the lights were. if you look up "[search info moved to fi section\cms\tg]" it should be the video with the video uploader named "[member nickname moved to fi section\cms\tg]". i believe you would enjoy it. thank you! [name removed\cms\tg]

Summary: we saw these over the east mountain range in provo utah while having a cigarette
